settings.instruction:
# Computer assisted actor identification

In the following texts, we want to identify all references to the mentioned actors. To make this task easier on mobile phone, we have used a simple dictionary to mark the actors that we are interested in, and marked all terms that are potential references.

The coder then only has to tab on the highlighted words to add or correct actor references

variables.name: actor
variables.instruction: Add and correct all references to the actors highlighted in this text.
